companyDetail: Established in 2004, SJ Innovation has completed more than a decade in the software industry. We specialize in providing IT solutions worldwide having expertise in web and mobile development with end-to-end solutions. Our head office is based in New York City with branches in India and Bangladesh. Our primary focus always is to provide the best services to our clients. Our strength lies in our team members. We believe in applying new ideas and technologies to improve our team and client satisfaction. Our project management team works out of the US office, offering you a better experience by effectively communicating your messages to the designer or developer. We as a team collaborate with customers, support and grow with them to provide high-quality work and ensure success. Moreover, we are constantly working on broadening our range of services and improving performance and maintaining long-standing relationships with our customers. We are always ahead in keeping complete work status updated with our clients via email, chat, IM or Skype/Zoom calls. Our company continually works toward improving employee satisfaction and happiness, hence improving productivity and the quality of work. Our services include: - AWS Cloud Services - Email & Landing Page Design - Quality Assurance & UAT- Drupal Development- Magento Services- QA Automation- Headless CMS Development- MERN Service- Cross-Platform and Native App Development- Flutter Services- Shopify Service- Healthcare Software Solution. SJ Innovation currently has over 160 employees worldwide and continues to grow. All of our employees are experts in their field, offering you over 100 years of combined experience.

companyDetail: Founded in 1975, Microsoft is the world's leading technology company that provides a wide range of software, hardware and services to its customers worldwide. Our mission is to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. With over 180,000 employees, we are committed to innovation, diversity and inclusion, and making a positive impact on the world.
jobDetail: We are seeking an experienced Backend Developer to join our team and work on exciting new projects.

companyDetail: Google LLC is an American multinational technology company that specializes in Internet-related services and products, which include online advertising technologies, a search engine, cloud computing, software, and hardware.
jobDetail: We are looking for a full stack developer to join our team in developing cutting-edge software products for our clients. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience in both front-end and back-end development, as well as experience working with databases and web servers.

companyDetail: Airbnb is a trusted online marketplace for people to list, discover, and book unique accommodations around the world.
jobDetail: We are seeking a talented UX Designer to join our team in designing user interfaces and experiences for our platform. The ideal candidate will have experience in designing for mobile and web, and a strong portfolio showcasing their work.

companyDetail: Tesla, Inc. is an American electric vehicle and clean energy company that designs, manufactures, and sells electric cars, battery energy storage systems, and solar products.
jobDetail: We are seeking a Machine Learning Engineer to join our Autopilot team to develop advanced algorithms for autonomous driving. The ideal candidate will have experience in machine learning and computer vision, as well as knowledge of programming languages such as Python and C++.

companyDetail: Nike, Inc. is an American multinational corporation that is engaged in the design, development, manufacturing, and worldwide marketing and sales of footwear, apparel, equipment, accessories, and services.
jobDetail: We are looking for a Marketing Manager to join our team to drive global marketing initiatives and develop brand strategies. The ideal candidate will have experience in marketing and communications, as well as strong project management and leadership skills.

companyDetail: Apple Inc. is an American multinational technology company headquartered in Cupertino, California, that designs, develops, and sells consumer electronics, computer software, and online services. The company's hardware products include the iPhone, iPad, Mac, iPod, Apple Watch, and Apple TV. Apple's software includes the macOS and iOS operating systems, the iTunes media player, the Safari web browser, and the iLife and iWork creativity and productivity suites.
jobDetail: We are seeking a Front End Developer with strong skills in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a passion for creating beautiful and responsive user interfaces and will be able to work collaboratively with designers and back-end developers.

companyDetail: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a subsidiary of Amazon.com that provides on-demand cloud computing platforms to individuals, companies, and governments, on a metered pay-as-you-go basis. In aggregate, these cloud computing web services provide a set of primitive abstract technical infrastructure and distributed computing building blocks and tools.
jobDetail: We are seeking an experienced Backend Developer to join our team and work on exciting new projects in the cloud computing space. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of databases, APIs, and web services, as well as experience with at least one programming language such as Java, Python, or Ruby.

companyDetail: Netflix is an American technology and media services provider and production company headquartered in Los Gatos, California. The company was founded in 1997 by Reed Hastings and Marc Randolph. Netflix is a streaming service that offers a wide variety of award-winning TV shows, movies, anime, documentaries, and more on thousands of internet-connected devices.
jobDetail: We are seeking an experienced Product Manager to join our team and help us in developing our platform by researching, defining, and prioritizing new features. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of product strategy, user research, and data analysis.
